Text: Restricted Stock Issued in dont have electronic versions of the tax treatment of restricted stock in Canada but will get you hard copies of the datadecisions provided by PriceWaterhouseCoopers on taxation in Canada and by Arthur Andersen on the discount applied John Ill fax copies to you The formula we used to determine the taxable benefit on the amended T was Stock price on discount X Fx rate X number of units Tax Benefit KimJohn can you please verify that your fax number is unchanged at Thanks
